ERR_ValueNotFoundInList: The value not found in list
ERR_FieldIsNotEmpty: The field must not be empty
ERR_ValueIsNotNull: The value must not be null
ERR_EqualTo: The value must be equal to '{comparison_value}'
ERR_NotEqualTo: The value must not be equal to '{comparison_value}'
ERR_ValueGreaterThan: The value must be greater than '{comparison_value}'
ERR_ValueGreaterThanOrEqual: The value must be greater than or equal to '{comparison_value}'
ERR_ValueLessThan: The value must be less than '{comparison_value}'
ERR_ValueLessThanOrEqual: The value must be less than or equal to '{comparison_value}'
ERR_MaximumLength: The value must be {max_length} characters or fewer. You entered {total_length} characters
ERR_MinimumLength: The value must be at least {min_length} characters. You entered {total_length} characters
ERR_ExclusiveBetween: The value must be between {min_val} and {max_val} (exclusive). You entered {property_value}
ERR_InclusiveBetween: The value must be between {min_val} and {max_val} (inclusive). You entered {property_value}
ERR_Length: The value must be between {min_len} and {max_len} characters
ERR_PrecisionScale: The value must not be more than {expected_precision} digits in total, with allowance for {expected_scale} decimals. {digits} digits and {actual_scale} decimals were found.
ERR_IsInEnum: The value is not in the specified range
ERR_Matches: The value is not in the correct format
